abstract: Jim Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.
snippet: Jim Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.
lead_paragraph: James S. Chanos, head of the New York hedge fund Kynikos Associates, has made a pretty good living calling bubbles, and he sat down with Business Insider to explain what he is shorting now.

headline.main: Chanos Sees Unfounded Euphoria in China
